column12: Prohibited since it is a biological medicinal product

column3: tegemist on kitsa terapeutilise vahemikuga ravimiga
column12: Prohibited since it is a medicinal product with narrow therapeutic index

column3: patsiendil esineb ülitundlikkus abiaine vastu, mis esineb kõigis teistes sarnastes ja sama toimeainega ravimites
column12: Prohibited because the patient has hypersensitivity for the excipient which is present in all similar medicinal products with same active ingredient

column3: patsienti on õpetatud kasutama konkreetset manustamisvahendit
column12: Prohibited because the patient has been taught to use this specific means for administration

column3: patsiendile on paremini talutav konkreetne ravim, mille toimekestus erineb kõigist teistest sama toimeainega ja ravimvormis ravimitest
column12: Prohibited because the patient tolerates this specific medicinal product due to the duration of action, which differs from all other medicinal products with same ingredient and dose form
Prohibited since it is a nutrition preparation

column3: abiainete koostis tagab toimeaine sellise vabanemiskoha, mis erineb kõigist teistest sarnastest ja sama toimeainega ravimitest
column12: Prohibited because the content of excipients ensures the site of release for ingredients, which is different from all other similar and with same ingredient medicinal products

column3: patsiendil on diagnoositud kaasuv psüühika- või käitumishäire
column12: Prohibited because the patient has been diagnosed with concurrent mental or behavioural disorder
Prohibited since it is a medicinal product with fringe benefit or without market authorisation in Estonia
Prohibited since it is a medicinal product which is purchased through a public procurement
